title: Corrupted files???????
body: Just got afk queue because the game waited till i was literally on the loading screen in ranked (after taking awhile on the client screen to 'repair files') to crash and tell me more files needed to be repaired? Now a whole game in ruined for 9 other people and i get afk queue because of that? Does my league need a reinstall? Has this happened to anyone else? What can i do if i just keep queueing afk queues will get worse if it keeps crashing on loading screen....

replies.body:
I would recommend making sure you are running League as administrator, then running the repair.

http://i.imgur.com/h2NTOH8.png?noredirect

If that doesn't work, or you are already running in admin, then I'd recommend doing a clean install through the Hextech Repair Tool.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool

Unsure if this is the case with you, but it's also worth noting that if you use fullscreen mode then alt-tabbing in the loading screen is not recommended, because you're essentially telling your computer you don't want to load it yet which can cause problems. If you want to alt-tab in loading, switch to borderless mode.
